name: meal-planner
description: 1. Download and install PostgreSQL: https://www.postgresql.org/download/ 2. To use `psql`, add the PostgreSQL installation directory (e.g. `C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\16\bin`) to your PATH (Windows: Windows+Start "environment variables" > Environment Variables > User variable = Path > Edit... > New > OK > OK > OK) 3. Restart your terminal. 4. Verify Postgres is installed with `psql -U postgres` and the password you used in the installation wizard (`\q` to quit).
